Text: ...Heheh!
This day has finally come...
The long-awaited...
...beach!

Mitsugoshi's newly established private beach.
Beta has arrived early and is enjoying the
beach under the guise of preparations.

This may be a mission to honor Master Shadow, but I
can't believe I was given such a role... Could it be
because of my day-to-day hard work? Hehehe.
...Oh, this drink tastes good.

Beta mutters as she sits on a beach chair, sipping
Mitsugoshi's special fruit drink.

While making Master Shadow feel refreshed is
top priority, it's okay for me to have a little fun...
Isn't it?

Looking back, I've been so absorbed in my missions
and writing that I can't remember the last time I
took a break...

Those blissful days when Master Shadow would read me
fairy tales feel like a distant memory... *sniff*

*sigh* Spending time with Master Shadow in such a
lovely place... It feels like a dream! It'll make for the
best memory ever!

I know! How about I theme my next novel around the
story of an elven princess who admires a prince from
a foreign land?

An interspecies love story...between two individuals
with complicated backgrounds. Yes! I like it.

...Huh?! How did ideas for the novel I've been
struggling with come so easily?!

I guess story ideas come naturally when you're
refreshed.

Must be the struggles of being a famous author.
Oh well...

I'll take it easy from now and give myself room
to breathe!
...Well, it's almost time to meet up with Epsilon.

I honestly wanted to enjoy a vacation at the beach
with just Master Shadow and me...but a situation
like this doesn't come around often.

For some reason, Epsilon often antagonizes me.
And when it comes to Master Shadow, mission or
not, there's a high chance she'll monopolize him...

As for me, I've been entrusted with a mission, so I
can't let my personal feelings get the better of me...
But if he were to get mesmerized by Epsilon...
...I don't think I could hold back!

No way I could! I also want to be pampered by
Master Shadow!

After all, I'm going to vacation at the beach with
him! That's an undeniable fact!
I've got to come up with my own plan!

Beta decides to devise a strategy to make Shadow
notice her in case something goes wrong.

Massages... I read in a book that even if an amateur
tries, they can upset the body's balance instead of
providing relief...

As for cooking...Epsilon has the upper hand. I don't
stand a chance...

While Beta's emotional self comes up with various
ideas, her rational self pokes holes in those
strategies. She desperately racks her brain...
...Oh! Maybe this situation might work...
Eeek!

As Beta and Shadow swim in the ocean, a wave suddenly
rushes in and snatches away her swimsuit.
Beta, are you okay?
Oh no! The waves carried away your swimsuit!
Waaah! What should I do, Master Shadow?
...Beta. Get on my back.
...Huh?
I'll carry you to the shore.
What?! That's...too much to ask!
The situation is what it is, so leave it to me.
Umm... Okay...thank you!

And my body presses tightly against Master Shadow's
firm back, and the warmth of our bodies touching...
Eeeek

Beta's imagination runs wild, and she lets out a loud
squeal.

What a perfect seduction operation! I'm sure Master
Shadow will fall for it—
Oh!

...But there's no way a swimsuit made of slime would
get washed away!

Besides, this is a private beach, and there's no one
here except for Master Shadow and Epsilon...
*sigh*

I've thought about it a lot, but I can't think of a
good strategy.

I could keep thinking about it, but it would be a
waste not to enjoy this vacation with Master
Shadow!

Beta smiles happily as she thinks about the time she
would spend on vacation with Shadow.
